      • fittingIteration

        protected double fittingIteration(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D> dataPoints,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> weights,
                      int t)
        Performs one iteration of the fitting algorithm on this curve (either the Point Distance Minimization Algorithm or the Squared Distance Minimization Algorithm, depending on the selected algorithm in the UI). Require that the number of data points is equal to the number of weights
        Parameters:
        dataPoints - The collection of data points to be fit to.
        weights - The weights of each of the data points
        t - The frame in the imageStack that this fitting will be performed on.
        Returns:
        The error of the fitting.

      • fittingIteration

        protected double fittingIteration(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D> dataPoints,

                      int t)
